title: Python virtualenv
code:
# Создание
python -m venv venv

# Активация (Linux/Mac)
source venv/bin/activate

# Активация (Windows)
venv\Scripts\activate

title: SQL выборка с JOIN
code:
SELECT 
    u.name,
    o.order_date,
    o.total
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id
WHERE o.total > 100
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
